name: Thrust Issues (Axiom5 Games)
description:
// Give us your feedback to help us make the game as good as it can be! //
(Current version: Alpha 1.)

Features:

Featuring three kick-ass levels, three modes of flying, an awesome synthwave soundtrack and mighty neon lights. Are you fast enough to beat the Kobayashi Trial?

How to play:

- Pull up the power lever, then press the ignition button to start the engine.
- Use the flipswitches to change gear modes.
- Grab, hold and move the handles to accelerate and steer.
- Pull the triggers to strafe left and right.
- Press the left hand button to open the pause menu. Here you can reset the orientation and change levels, among other things.
- Use the laser from your right hand to select menu options, and pull the trigger to select.
- Press the right hand button to activate the boost afterburner. Release to deactivate.

Disclaimer:

Do not play this game if suffering from epilepsy or any other ailment affecting your health. This game runs on SteamVR. This is an alpha build, not representative of final quality. Bugs, features, and lack thereof may appear. Play at your own risk, and have fun. Tested with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and Valve Index. May or may not work properly with other devices.
